TopicTitle: Kerbal States: A Kerbal Nations Roleplay Reboot!

Articles.Content:
*Mods- please note this is an advertisement to an* ***external*** *forum- not for here. I am trying to prevent breaking rule 2.x (roleplaying).*

*Yes for older members- I am aware this has been done before (hence REDUX), but this is my own attempt.*

By the request of others- I have decided to (yet again) start a roleplay where you run your own mighty nation on Kerbin- you control it and you can decide its fate. You can become the single greatest military force on Kerbin- OR you can lead the world in your scientific discoveries! Or even simply become the terror or peace maker of Kerbin. 

This forum is currently a work in progress and being made as of yet- and we are requiring members as we have very little as of yet.

There will be an economy system which will have you manage several resources: *Raw materials*, *fuels*, *food* and *water*. Raw materials is what you use to make anything from buildings to crafts. Fuels is what you use to power your cities and move your crafts. Food and water is consumed by Kerbals everyday and failing to feed your Kerbals could lead to you becoming an evil tyrant running your country and having your Kerbals die of hunger/thirst.

You also have to manage your money and provide power! Power can be made from several places- it can be made from a Chemical Power Plant (equal to a coal power plant in today's world)- you can also make a solar or wind farm to collect power, doesn't require constant feeding of fuels, but it provides less power. All at the same time you have to manage your cash! Don't run yourself into an economic depression! Keep your money up and stay on top!!

If you get yourself into a military engagement- then you will have to defend yourself or begin as the assaulting force. This is where military engineers can dedicate their expert creations to dueling it out- in the skies, in the water, on land or in space. You can conquer nations- or defend key military installations, you can even assault major cities to weaken the morale of a nation. It's your army and your power.

Your creations within KSP can now be used in this world and you can create massive trade vessels to move resources to other nations, via by air, sea, land or space! You can also use your builds as a way to move your nation with cars, planes and TRAINS! Your creations can even be used for battle and war! So no creation can't be used- now everything can be used for anything and everything!
